messages.messageBody:
About the sharks, I just learned this the other day---TOO cool!

This shark is sluggish and usually unaggressive, but like all sharks it has
the potential to be dangerous, especially considering its size. A researcher
hand-checking a pregnant female Sand Tiger was even bitten by one of the
unborn baby sharks inside! Many types of sharks are actually in-utero
cannibals, born live and surprisingly big after feeding on their unfortunate
siblings inside their mother's womb






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
